“When life gives you lemons, don’t make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don’t want your damn lemons, what the hell am I supposed to do with these?" Demand Portal 3 , or at least Portal 2. It's no lemon, and with the Perpetual Testing Initiative, it's always a good time to head back to Aperture.

You fight a moronic robot speaking with British accent while armed with a portal gun and a potato.
10/10
Great fun and techincal

Masterpiece! It's unbelievable! This game shows great genius minds behind it, and it shows in every single detail in the game. In its single player, multiplayer, design, humor, physics, puzzles... I've played it many times in single-player and multiplayer, and I think I'll play it much more. It's not a very easy game since the puzzles are a bit challenging, but it's very very easy to learn.

Valve, I hope you'll know how to count to 3 sometime soon... I can't imagine the rest of my life without a Portal 3 (putting aside Half-Life 3, Left4Dead 3, Team Fortress 3... or at least Half-Life 2: Episode 3).

Highly recommended!
PORTALS! its great. Funny too
Es un juegaso desafias a tu mente en misiones estrategicas las historia es una pasada es genial el COOP No lo eh probado pero pero tiene pinta te ser bastante bueno lo recomiendo :D

Игра увлекает с первых минут, даже больше чем первая игра, которая по-сути являлась экспериментом. Добавление гелей из игры Tag: The Power of Paintпошло на пользу. Очень увлекательный синглплеер с неплохим сюжетом и просто космической концовкой (те кто прошёл поймут юмор), а кооператив я вообще молчу, интересно до самого конца. Прошёл Portal 2 столько раз и на пиратке, и на недавно купленной лицензии, что уже видеть его не могу, однако исправно играю с другом - таким же фанатом вселенной Portal (но не Half-Life). Однако, буду судить справедливо, поставлю 9,5/10.

P.S. Valve и уважаемый Gabe Newell, браво!
15 out of 10 stars.  One of my all time faves, can't rave enough about it.  Outdoes the original somehow.
Best game to play while high, literally thought i was going through portals and was a robot, thanks vavle,

I grew up under a pair of very conservative, Obama-hating right-wing parents who wished to cleanse the world of all atheists, so you could probably imagine my surprise when my father proclaimed his love for this game. That's how cute this game is.

Some of the puzzles were boring, though.

Мне очень понравилась игра компании "Valve" Portal 2.Сюжет сразу мне понравился с первых минут игры.Были моменты,когда было сложно пройти уровни,но это даже придает остринку игре,и причем тренируется логическое мышление.Всем советую.Играйте.Наслаждайтесь.Прочувствуйте графику.Кичаууу!!!

[h1]Put down the gun and pick up the ASHPD[/h1]
This is, to put it simply, ONE OF THE GREATEST GAMES I HAVE EVER PLAYED.
There is a multitude of reasons for this, but for now: Gameplay.
The Portals are as masterful as in the original, and other gameplay elements, such as the Arial Faith Plate and Excursion funnel, are just as well executed. "Asbestos is Harmless!"
Music: The game's musical score is impressive, with terrifying songs such as Ghost of Rattman, and ones that just make your heart pump fast, including [spoiler]The Part Where He Kills You[/spoiler]. NOTE: The entire OST is available for free direct from Valve. Worth every zero cents I spent on it.
Concept: Chell wakes up potentially centuries after the destruction of GLaDOS, and finds herself in what looks like a crappy motel room while a male voice tells her to evacuate Aperture Science/Laboratories/OSHA Nightmare/Whatever RIGHT NOW. However, with the help of a bumbling Personality Sphere named Wheatley, she unwittingly wakes up GLaDOS. Let the science begin...
Voice: All the voice actors did an amazing job, most especially Ellen McLain, who sings 3 SONGS on the OST: [spoiler]POtaTOS' Lament, Cara Mia Addio, and Want You Gone[/spoiler]. Also: "Well. Have fun soaring through the air without a care in the world. I have to go to the wing made entirely of glass, and pick up [i]fifteen acres of broken glass. [b]By myself.[/b][/i]
Other: Co-op is the best 2-player I have played, ever. The same brainbusting difficulty of the singleplayer story, but you tackle it with a friend.
Portal 2 has been added to the list of Game of the Decade.
best multiplayer ever
Really good game amazing
best game ever

Что ж, это было довольно долгое и интересное приключение.Начиная с простых кнопок, и заканчивая экскурсионной воронкой, мы прошли через весь глубинных комплекс Апенчуры.Правда, мне показалось, что Уитли немного легче Глэдос из первой части.

Эту игру стоит купить хотя бы из-за очень качественного саундтрека и научного юмора.Также эту игру стоит купить из-за качественного кооператива, в котором либо мы работаете как команда, либо терпите неудачи всё снова и снова.

I never bought this game orginally because I'm never really into puzzle type games. I did get it on sale though and WOW, the game is amazing! The puzzles actually make you think for a while but not so hard that you want to just give up. The script is one of the best I've ever come across in a video game, possibly even inlcuding movies. Wheatley definitely made the game epic for me. Definitely recommend!

Um jogo viciante e que recomendo. Comecei por jogar o Portal e adorei o jogo. Resolvi experimentar este e foram feitas melhorias em relação ao Portal. Este jogo tem uma jogabilidade espetacular, uma física extraordinária e uma pessoa nao quer sempre saber qual é o proximo nivel, sempre com puzzles mais complexos. Outro aspecto interessante, é a história do portal para o portal 2.
Deixo aqui a minha opiniao e façam como eu, esperem por uma promoção se quiserem pagar um preço reduzido xD
шедевр 10 из 10

Obra maestra, es una compra obligada, es sublime, si todos los juegos se hicieran con tanto detalle en cuanto a historia y otras cosas que van sucediendo, el mundo del videjouego sería mucho mejor.

El 1 ya era buenísimo, en esta segunda parte se han superado por completo, mejor hisotria, mayor duración y hasta un editor de niveles y puedes jugar a niveles hechos por la comunidad, lo que te da infinitas posibilidades.

Sin sangre, sin más violencia que las amenazas de un robot paranoico , Portal 1 y Portal 2 son los juegos perfectos para trabajar la coordinación oculo mano a cualquier edad. Mas de 20 puzles com una dificultad creciente convierten a este titulo en el mejor entorno para que entrenar la orientación espacial y la resolucion de problemas lógicos (no aritméticos)

Definitiv eine mehr als gelungene Fortsetzung eines innovativen und intelligenten Spiels.
Absolute Kauf- und Spielempfehlung ! Der Singleplayer ist voll von witzigen Momenten und wird nie langweilig.

Some of the best writing and story that I have come across. I'm usually very picky with my puzzle games, but Portal blew me away and now Portal 2 is just as good if not better. It's a game everyone should have in their library, or I'll burn your house down, with a lemon. End of story.

在特惠的时间入的合集包，非常的超值~一开始玩以为这只是单纯的解密游戏，但是玩到后面的话发现剧情也是非常的不错！在百度了一下光圈科技后，才知道v社的几款游戏都是共用一个世界观的，等以后hl打折后再一起入了吧。另外，这个游戏的乐趣在于和小伙伴联机一起玩~什么时候能拿到全成就呢 ☺

Brilliant puzzle game!  The writing and voice acting was absolutely hillarious and the puzzles were challenging without being overly frustrating.  I havn't tried coop yet, but that option is there, and there is a very user friendly editor to make levels to challenge your friends.  I was able to make a neat little level for my kids successfully without even reading an instruction manual.  I went through the entire game and did not notice any bugs, nor did I get into any situations forcing a reload.  Mistakes are mostly recoverable (except when you die obviously).  Overall this has been a very enjoyable game so far!
